name: Cii Technology Solutions
tag_list: managed-services, networking, servers, computer-security, custom-software, mobile-apps
description: Cii is an all-in-one technical services
overview:
This technology services company has been in existence for over 30 years in the Raleigh Triangle area. It began in 1981 as Computer Intelligence, Incorporated. In 1993 the company (known by then simply as “Cii”) was named a Triangle Future 30 company by the Greater Raleigh Chamber of Commerce and one of the 50 fastest growing private companies in the Triangle by Triangle Business Journal. The company moved to its current Six Forks Road location in 2005. This company recently changed its name to Cii Technology Solutions to better reflect the many services it offers.

Cii has two sister companies: LobbyGuard Solutions, LLC and Elsinore Technologies. Important clients have included Duke University, Blue Cross/Blue Shield, Alien Skin Software, Habitat for Humanity of Wake County, Mercator Inc, and Nufarm Americas Inc.
